data.system_settings: Desktop: Windows 10, Discord Canary latest, Mobile: Discord Android Beta 3.7.7
data.actual_result: On mobile, it shows as a channel link (only shows for some people, all of the not having access to that channel), On desktop, plain text.
data.expected_result: It should also appear as plain text on mobile as you don't have access to it
data.short_description: "Links" to channels that only mods can access on a server can be seen on mobile, but on the desktop version, appear as plain text (e.g. #log for some servers).
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message where you include a # link to a chanel that only specific people can access (and you can't) - Open Discord on mobile and go to that message.
